column.name: do_cache
column.label: Enable caching
column.suffix: Turn caching off if you are working on configuring this entries. Cache is flushed after 90 seconds

column.name: exclude_patterns
column.label: Exclude Patterns
column.suffix: Patterns to exclude. One per line.

column.name: percent
column.label: Percentage Filter
column.suffix: 0-1: for buckets with lots (100+) of children this is a probability that any one of them will be returned. It allows you to take a sample

column.name: convert_dates
column.label: Convert dates
column.suffix: Convert years and days if the file names match the patterns

column.name: date_patterns
column.label: Date Patterns
column.suffix:
Patterns to extract the date from a bucket name
Format:
pattern;template;date format
e.g.:
.%*(\d\d\d\d)_(\d\d)_(\d\d).*;${1}-${2}-${3};yyyy-MM-dd
